Rulings.Goat:
●The maintenance cost is optional, you may chose not to play 100 LP and Messenger of Peace will be destroyed.
●The ATK of an attacking monster may increase above 1500 after the attack is declared. 
●Q: If there is a Face-up “Messenger of Peace” on the field and I attack with “Injection Fairy Lily,” can I use its effect to increase the attack by 3000? 
A: “Messenger of Peace” stops the declaration of an attack with a monster of 1500 or more ATK, any increases after the Battle Step are not counted. 
● 12/08/03
●Q: If “Spell Canceller” is face-up on the field, do you have to pay the cost for “Messenger of Peace”? 
A: No you would not have to pay for Messenger of Peace while the effect of Spell Canceller is applying. The same would be true if Imperial Order was applying.
